001package reciprocal.linear.vector;
002
003import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkArgument;
004import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
005
006import java.io.Serial;
007import java.util.List;
008import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
009
010/**
011 * Immutable implementation of a vector which uses {@link Long} as type for its elements
012 *
013 * @since 0.0.1
014 */
015public final class LongVector extends AbstractVector<@NotNull Long, @NotNull LongVector, @NotNull Double> {
016    @Serial
017    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
018
019    LongVector(final int size, final @NotNull List<@NotNull VectorEntry<@NotNull Long>> entries) {
020        super(size, entries);
021    }
022
023    /**
024     * Returns a {@link LongVectorBuilder}
025     *
026     * @param size size
027     * @return {@link LongVectorBuilder}
028     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when {@code size < 1}
029     * @since 0.0.1
030     */
031    public static LongVectorBuilder ofSize(final int size) {
032        return new LongVectorBuilder(size);
033    }
034
035    @Override
036    public @NotNull LongVector add(final @NotNull LongVector summand) {
037        requireNonNull(summand, "summand");
038        checkArgument(getSize() == summand.getSize(), "equal sizes expected but %s != %s", getSize(),
039            summand.getSize());
040        return new LongVector(getSize(),
041            getEntries().map(e -> e.withElement(e.element() + summand.getElement(e.index()))).toList());
042    }
043
044    @Override
045    public @NotNull LongVector subtract(final @NotNull LongVector subtrahend) {
046        requireNonNull(subtrahend, "subtrahend");
047        checkArgument(getSize() == subtrahend.getSize(), "equal sizes expected but %s != %s", getSize(),
048            subtrahend.getSize());
049        return new LongVector(getSize(),
050            getEntries().map(e -> e.withElement(e.element() - subtrahend.getElement(e.index()))).toList());
051    }
052
053    @Override
054    public @NotNull Long dotProduct(final @NotNull LongVector other) {
055        requireNonNull(other, "other");
056        checkArgument(getSize() == other.getSize(), "equal sizes expected but %s != %s", getSize(), other.getSize());
057        return getEntries().map(e -> e.element() * other.getElement(e.index())).reduce(Long::sum)
058            .orElseThrow();
059    }
060
061    @Override
062    public @NotNull LongVector scalarMultiply(final @NotNull Long scalar) {
063        requireNonNull(scalar, "scalar");
064        return new LongVector(getSize(), getEntries().map(e -> e.withElement(scalar * e.element())).toList());
065    }
066
067    @Override
068    public @NotNull LongVector negate() {
069        return new LongVector(getSize(), getEntries().map(e -> e.withElement(-e.element())).toList());
070    }
071
072    @Override
073    public boolean orthogonalTo(final @NotNull LongVector other) {
074        requireNonNull(other, "other");
075        checkArgument(getSize() == other.getSize(), "equal sizes expected but %s != %s", getSize(), other.getSize());
076        return dotProduct(other) == 0L;
077    }
078
079    @Override
080    public @NotNull Double taxicabNorm() {
081        return getElements().map(Math::abs).reduce(Long::sum).map(Long::doubleValue).orElseThrow();
082    }
083
084    @Override
085    public @NotNull Double euclideanNorm() {
086        return Math.sqrt(euclideanNormPow2());
087    }
088
089    @Override
090    public @NotNull Double maxNorm() {
091        return getElements().map(Math::abs).max(Long::compareTo).map(Long::doubleValue).orElseThrow();
092    }
093
094    @Override
095    protected @NotNull Double euclideanNormPow2() {
096        return getElements().map(e -> e * e).reduce(Long::sum).map(Long::doubleValue).orElseThrow();
097    }
098
099    /**
100     * Builder for {@link LongVector LongVectors}
101     *
102     * @since 0.0.1
103     */
104    public static final class LongVectorBuilder extends AbstractVectorBuilder<Long, LongVector, LongVectorBuilder> {
105        LongVectorBuilder(final int size) {
106            super(size, i -> 0L);
107        }
108
109        @Override
110        public @NotNull LongVector build() {
111            return new LongVector(getSize(), computeEntries());
112        }
113    }
114}
